text.ここに誓います！貴方の指導で\r\n私は全てのウマ娘の模範たる…\r\n最強の学:
This I swear! Under your guidance, 
I will become worthy of being an 
exemplary role model for all Uma Musume… 
I shall become the greatest class president 
there ever was!
text.トレーナーさんのご指導に間違いは\r\nありませんとも！なぜなら…\r\n私のト: There is never error in Trainer's guidance! Why?…Because you're my Trainer!
text.携帯の充電は完璧にしてきました！\r\nいつ・どこで・どのように迷っても\r\n:
My cellphone has been fully charged! 
Now, no matter when, where, or how I get 
lost, I can contact you, Trainer!
text.今年の抱負はバ・ク・シ・ンです！\r\n去年のお正月から決めてました！:
This year's resolution is Ba・ku・shin! 
I've had it decided since New Year's 
Day last year!
text.調理中にチョコが…爆発しました。\r\n私の熱い感謝の気持ちに、\r\n耐え切れ:
While cooking, the chocolate 
I was making… blew up. 
I guess it just couldn't withstand my 
explosively passionate feelings!
text.大人なトレーナーさんのために！\r\nこんがり焦げたビターなチョコを\r\nご用:
For Trainer, who has a mature palate! 
I have prepared for you bitter chocolate 
that has been burnt to a crisp, therefore 
making it extra dark! Fufuu―n!
text.…より速く、より速く、より速く！\r\nさあ、来なさい流れ星！\r\n願いごとの:
…Faster, faster, faster! 
Now, I command you to shoot now, shooting star! 
My wish has been sufficiently prepared!!
text.トリックオアトリートッッッ！\r\nあれ？呪文を唱えれば無料でお菓子\r\nをも:
Trick-or-treaaaaat! 
Huh? Nothing happened? I heard if 
you recite those magic words, you'll 
get free candy…
text.クリスマスも全力で楽しみますよ！\r\n行事を率先して動かす存在こそ、\r\n学:
Let's enjoy Christmas to the very fullest! 
I'm the one who takes the initiative to 
organize all the holiday events, 
because it's the class president's duty!
text.トレーナーさん、知ってますか？\r\nサンタはものすごーく速いのです。\r\nこ:
Trainer, did you know? Santa is extreeemely 
fast. So fast that he eludes me…!
text.大掃除ですね！？任せてください！\r\n床のものを全て捨てれば、\r\n大概の部:
Lots of cleaning to do?! Leave it to me! 
If you just throw away all the stuff lying 
on the floor, it'll make most places 
look great!
text.誕生日ですし、身の回りの世話は\r\n私に任せてゆっくりしてください！\r\n今:
It's your birthday, so please take care of 
yourself, kick back, and relax! I have 
the utmost confidence in myself not to 
break anything today!
text.お誕生日おめでとうございますッ！\r\nトレーナーさんは見事に成長された\r\n:
A very happy birthday to you, Trainer! 
I see… the fact that you have aged superbly! 
(Clapclapclap!)
text.今日こそは私が生まれた日！\r\n記念日に制定いただいても、\r\n私、一向に構:
Today is the fateful day I was born! 
I wouldn't have any objections if you 
decided to make it a national holiday!
text.えへへ…先ほど父上と母上からも\r\n誕生日おめでとうと言われまして…\r\n実:
Ehehe… My dad and mom wished me 
a happy birthday earlier… To tell you 
the truth, I'm on cloud nine right now!
text.何かお知らせがあるようです！\r\n私のクラスに関係があることかも\r\nしれま:
It seems like there's some news! 
It might have something to do with my class! 
Let's check it out!
text.プレゼントが届いているらしい\r\nですよ！我々の活躍を聞き及んだ\r\n誰かか:
It seems a present has arrived! 
Could it be, a gift from someone 
who caught wind of our spectacular efforts?
text.目標を達成されたみたいですね！\r\n私もハナ高々です！エッヘン！:
It looks like you've completed a goal! 
I'm quite proud of myself, too! Ehhen!
text.ほぉ…イベントがあるみたいです。\r\nどの学級の委員長が用意してるのか\r\n:
Ohh… It looks like there's an event going on. 
Which class president made the necessary 
provisions… I must investigate this.
text.何やらにぎやかですね…学級委員長\r\nの許可なく楽しいことをするとは…\r\n:
It's quite lively, isn't it… Doing something 
fun without the authorization of the class 
president… Uuuu～… Please let me join iiin!
text.エネルギー切れが近くとも…\r\n私は強く…みんなの模範として…\r\n走り続け:
Even if my energy is almost exhausted… 
I'll stay strong… As an example for everyone… 
I… will… keep……running!
text.ぐ、ぐぐぐぅ…。\r\n動きなさい私の脚ぃ～！！\r\nなぜ重くなるのですぅ～！:
U, uuughh… 
Move, legs, mooove～!! 
Why are you so heavyyy―?!
text.全生徒の模範として！\r\n素晴らしいトレーニング姿を\r\n見せて差し上げまし:
A role model for students everywhere! 
I shall show you all my magnificent training!!
text.私の大バクシンにご期待ください！\r\n今日はやってやりますよぉおお！！:
Please expect nothing but the biggest 
of Bakushins! Today, I'm giving 
it my aaaaalll!!
text.どんなトレーニングでも、\r\nこのバクシンオーなら\r\nやり遂げて見せますと:
No matter the training, this 
Bakushin O right here will 
show you how it's done!
text.準備運動はバッチリです！\r\nささっ、どんなトレーニングを\r\n致しましょう:
Warm-up has been flawlessly completed! 
Now, now, which training shall we do?!
text.トレーニングの時間ですね！\r\n承知しました！:
I see, it's training time! 
Roger that!
text.はー…今日も空は綺麗ですねー…。:
Haah～… The sky is beautiful 
as always today, isn't it～…
text.う～…学級委員長としてはぁ～…\r\n委員長としてはぁ～…すべきことは\r\nわ:
Uuuugh… As class representative… 
As president… I know what I must do, 
buuuut…!
text.レースですよね？…大丈夫です！\r\n脚に力は入らずとも…\r\n私ならばいけま:
A race, right?…I'm fine! 
Even if I don't have the same 
lightning in my legs… 
I can still do it…!
text.…トレーナーさぁー…ん…。\r\nまたレース、ですかぁー…？\r\n流石の私も休:
…Traaain… errrr… 
A-are we doing another raaace…? 
As you may have anticipated, I 
have to say, I want a breaaak…
text.感じます！委員長コールをしたい\r\nというみなさんからの熱い視線を！\r\nそ:
I can feel it! The passionate gazes of 
those who want to cheer on the 
class president staring at me! 
I shall answer the call and meet your expectations!
text.誰が相手だろうともバクシン\r\nするのみです！こう見えて私、\r\n自信は溢れ:
No matter who your opponent is, 
Bakushin all the way! Though looks 
may be deceiving, in truth I am 
overflowing with confidence!
text.レースに向けて体調をばっちり\r\n整えてきました！こうなった私は\r\n最強！:
I'm in flawless shape for this race! 
Truly, I'm the greatest! It's almost 
as if I've already won!
text.一走入魂！どんなレースでも\r\n手は抜きませんよ！:
I shall put my heart and soul into 
every sprint! No matter the race, I 
refuse to cut corners!
text.今の私は誰よりも速い！\r\nつまり、いつも通りですっ！:
Right now, I'm faster than 
anyone else! In other words, 
business as usual!
text.正しい呼吸で正しい\r\nコンディション！そして私が\r\n勝つのも当然正しいこ:
Proper breathing, proper 
condition! And, of course, 
it's proper that I win!
text.スピード勝負なら負けませんよ！:
If it's a speed showdown, I 
won't lose it!
text.ハイッ、勝利をお約束します！: Most assuredly, I promise you victory!
text.もう走っていいですか？\r\nいいですよね！:
May I start running now? 
I may, right?!
text.ふむむ…脚がちょびーっとだけ\r\n震えてきました。これがみなさんが\r\n感じ: Hmhmhm… My legs have started trembling the tiiiiniest bit. Perhaps these are the "nerves" that everyone's been feeling.
text.…何も考えずにバクシンする\r\nことにしました！大丈夫、\r\nきっと勝てます:
…I Bakushin-ed without thinking! 
It'll be fine, we'll win for sure!
text.不安を感じる必要はありません。\r\n私が全て吹き飛ばして\r\n差し上げますか:
There's no need to worry. 
Because I shall blow everyone away and 
leave the opposition in the dust for you!
text.…昨日、最下位になる\r\n夢を見たんです。\r\nでも夢は夢…ですよね！？:
…Yesterday, I dreamt I came in 
last place. But, a dream is just 
a dream… right?!
text.どんな苦境に立ったとしても、\r\n私には1着になる秘訣があります。\r\nそれ: No matter the predicament I find myself in, I have a secret to coming in first place. That secret is…speed!!
text.恐れる気持ちはわかります。\r\nですが、速いものが勝つ…\r\nただそれだけの:
I understand being scared. 
But, the fastest wins… and 
that is the simple, eternal truth!
text.ご指導、ありがとうございました！: The sincerest of thank you's for your guidance!
text.うーん。やっぱり私、優秀ですね！: Indeeed. Just as expected, I'm superb!
text.うむうむ…みなの憧れは私のままでしょう！:
Hmhm… It seems I still have everyone's 
undying admiration!
text.他の子も速かった！それは認めましょうとも！: Everyone else was fast, too! Let us acknowledge this!
text.委員長コールをお願いしますね！:
I'm counting on you for a class 
president-inspired cheer, 
please and thank you!
text.ライブだって、優秀にこなしてみせます！:
I shall demonstrate to you how to 
put on the most superior of Lives!
text.私との出会いこそ、\r\n貴方にとっての運命の瞬間\r\nだったのでしょうね！う:
Meeting me must have been a 
moment of divine destiny for you! Fufu!
text.今日も元気にご挨拶！さあ、お腹の\r\n底までしっかり空気を吸ってー…\r\nお: Time for a spirited greeting today, as usual! Come on, now, breathe in aaall the way, and… Gooooood morniiiingg――!!
text.黒板掃除に、花瓶の水替え…\r\n学級委員長は朝から大忙しです！\r\nまったく:
Cleaning the blackboard, changing the 
water in the vases… This class president 
has been booked since this morning! 
Truly… I'm just remarkable!
text.トレーナーさん！こんにちはッ！\r\n午後のトレーニングも、\r\n張り切って参:
Trainer! Greetings! 
Let's put 100% into our afternoon 
training, just as we always do―!
text.お昼ご飯を食べて元気満タンです！\r\nさあ、トレーニングでも併走でも、\r\n:
My energy is at full capacity after 
having refueled with some lunch! Come, now― 
training, running, sprinting! Anything 
you've got, throw it at me, please!
text.今日も1日、お疲れ様です！\r\n…うんうん！人を労われる私、\r\n素晴らしい:
Thank you for your hard work today! 
… Yes, yes! I'm fantastic at thanking 
people, aren't I!
text.授業が終わり、終業の鐘が鳴っても\r\n私、まだまだ頑張りますッ！\r\nなにせ:
Even when class ends and the bell rings, 
I'll still keep doing my best! After all, 
I'm the class president!!
text.何度訪れても春は素晴らしい…\r\nそう！私が！学級委員長に！\r\n選ばれた季:
No matter how many times I see it, 
Spring is marvelous… 
Yes! Because! It is! The class 
president's! Chosen! Season!!
text.スイカには塩派、砂糖派と、\r\n各々の流派があるそうですが…\r\n私はすぐに:
I heard that there are many different 
ways to eat watermelon. It seems you can 
eat it with things like salt and sugar… 
But I'm Team Shove-It-All-in-Your-Face-at-Once!
text.聖蹄祭をはじめ、行事が多い季節\r\nですから。学級委員長の腕の見せ所\r\n…:
'Tis the season of many events, including 
the Holy Hoof Festival. And 'tis the season to 
show off my skills as class president! Heheh!
text.寒い時は私の笑顔を見てください。\r\n心から温まると母上から絶賛された\r\n:
When it's cold out, please simply gaze 
upon my smiling face! Because this 
smile was acclaimed by my very own 
mother for warming the heart… Cheeese!
text.本日も学園は異常なしです！\r\nビコーさんと一緒にパトロール\r\nしてきまし:
Nothing out of the ordinary at school 
today! I've been on patrol with Biko-san, 
so you can rest easy!
text.クラスをまとめる秘訣ですか？\r\n…それはもちろん、\r\n優秀な学級委員長が:
The secret to unifying a class? 
… That is, of course, a brilliant 
class president!
text.時にはご褒美も必要ですからね。\r\n自分で自分を褒めることにします。\r\nな:
Sometimes I need a reward, you know. 
I shall praise myself now as such. 
Good job, me, good job.
text.ブルボンさんもライスさんも毎日\r\n頑張ってて、私大変誇らしいです！\r\n2:
Bourbon-san and Rice-san are doing their 
best every single day, and I'm very proud 
of them! Both of them deserve a gold star!!
text.…トレーナーさん、何か仰って\r\nくださいっ！私、無言で見られると\r\nこう:
…Trainer, please say something, 
anything! Whenever you look me all silent 
like that… I get the heebie-jeebies!
text.ええ、私は完璧ですから！\r\n3分の振り付けを1分以内で\r\n踊り切ってみせ:
Indeed, I am impossibly flawless! As such, 
allow me to dance the 3 minute-long 
choreography you gave me in under 
a minute!
text.しばらくはこの服を\r\n着たままで過ごします！\r\n脱ぐ時、大変なので！:
I'll be wearing this outfit for a while! 
Because whenever I try to take 
it off, it ends up being quite the 
challenge!
text.みなさんが私に抱く期待通り、\r\nひときわ輝く大きなサクラを\r\n2人で咲か:
Just as everyone is expecting of me, 
let's show them this big, shining 
Sakura blossom together!
text.私、あらゆるレースで\r\n勝ってみせますとも！それでこそ、\r\n学級委員長で:
I shall win every single race! That 
is why I'm the class president! 
Iiiindeed!!
text.最近登校時間によくフラワーさんと\r\n出会うんです。しっかり者同士、\r\nひ:
Lately, I've been meeting Flower-san 
a lot when I walk to school. Mayhaps, 
I've drawn her to me with my 
irresistible charms!
text.午前のテストの結果ですか？\r\nははっ、ご心配なさらずとも補習\r\nくらいす:
Test scores are being posted in 
the morning? Ha-ha, don't you worry! 
I'll finish my supplementary lessons 
straightaway!
text.宿題は2分で終わらせてきました！\r\n問題文など見なくとも、私には\r\n朝飯:
I finished my homework in two minutes 
flat! Even without looking at the questions, 
it was a piece of cake for me!
text.母上の桜餅はそれはそれは美味で！\r\n購買のメニューに加えるべきだと、\r\n: Mother's sakura mochi is aaabsolutely delicious! I'll keep insisting it should be on your shopping list! …Drooool.
text.どんなに暑くともだらしない格好はNGです！学級委員長に憧れる生徒を失望させてはな:
No matter how hot it is outside, an untidy 
appearance is a no-go! I refuse to 
disappoint the diligent pupils who 
admire the class president so fervently!
text.この時期は月明かりで読書をする\r\nようにしております。優等生は、\r\nそう:
Around this time of year, I try to read 
in the moonlight. I heard somewhere 
that honor students tend to do that.
text.寒くとも厚着は致しません！\r\nその方が軽くて、\r\n速くなれるからです！:
Even if it's cold, I don't wear heavy 
clothes! Because it's lighter, not 
to mention faster!
text.長距離だってお任せを！\r\nいつか得意になるはずなので！:
Leave the long distance races to me! 
I'm bound to be good at them someday!
text.私は晴れの日が好きです！\r\nなぜなら走りやすいからです！\r\n報告は以上で:
I am very fond of sunny days! 
The reason: because they're easy to run in! 
That is all for this report! Ehhen!
text.スピード！瞬発力！学級委員長！\r\n全てがそろった私の、\r\nどの面から伸ば:
Speed! Explosive power! Class president! 
I'm made up of all three, but which 
shall we further develop first?!
text.学級委員長として！\r\n誠心誠意！努力いたしますとも！:
As class president! With my whole heart! 
I shall do my very best!
text.みんなの模範になる準備は\r\nできていますよ！\r\nなぜなら学級委員長ですか:
I'm prepared to be everyone's role 
model! Because I am the class president!
text.トレーナーさんと私の二人三脚なら\r\nどんなに耐え難いトレーニングでも\r\n:
As long as you and I work together, 
Trainer, we can overcome even the 
most arduous of trainings with ease!
text.前人未踏の記録まで、\r\n私は止まらずに進み続けます！\r\nバクシンッ、バク:
I will not stop until I've set an 
unprecedented world-record! 
Bakushin, Bakushiii―n!!
text.貴方と咲かせたこのサクラ、散ることはありません！:
This Sakura that has bloomed with you 
shall never fall!
text.ふふん、みなさんの理想であり続けますよ！:
Fufun, I'll keep on being everyone's role 
model!
text.どの世界の学級委員長にも負けない力を…！！:
Give me the strength to win against any 
class president, from any world…!!
text.ハイッ、サクラバクシンオーです！: Affirmative, this is Sakura Bakushin O!
text.背筋ピーンッ！といきましょう！: Set your back as straight as a line!
text.学級委員長に続けーッ！: I'll keep on being the class presideeent!
text.新記録！成長盛り！: A new record! The peak of Sakura season!
text.おおっ！力を感じますっ！: Ooooh! I can feel the power―!
text.学級委員長がついていますよッ！: Have no fear, the class president is here!
text.優等生ですからッ！\r\nハッハッハッハッハッハッハー！:
Because I'm an honor student! 
Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha―!
text.どーぞどーぞ！この逸材、\r\n鍛え上げちゃってください！:
By all means, go right ahead! 
Please do train this spectacular talent!
text.人生とは、予習復習の繰り返し！\r\n優等生の第一歩です！:
Life is an endless cycle of preparing for 
a lesson and reviewing that lesson! 
These are the first steps to becoming 
an honor student!
text.レースでバクシン、しますか！？: Are you going to Bakushin in a race!?
text.お見事！トレーナーさん、\r\n名鑑レベルが上がりました！:
Well done! Trainer, your 
directory level has gone up!
text.オオーー！やってやりますとも！: Oooh―! I'll give it my best shot!
text.頑張りましょう！\r\n大丈夫、私がついてますッ！:
Let's do our very best! 
No need to worry, I am here!
text.誰よりも制服が似合う！\r\nそう、学級委員長ですから！:
The school uniform suits me better than anyone else! 
You guessed it, because I'm the class president!
text.制服とは、神聖な衣！\r\n毎日ちゃんと畳んでます！:
School uniforms are sacred garments! 
I fold mine properly every single day!
text.ビシッ！…はいッ！\r\n学級のスターが着るにふさわしい服ですね！:
…Indeed! An outfit worthy of being 
worn by the star of the class!
text.着方を忘れるので、説明書を作ったんです！\r\n…今度こそ無くしません！:
I'd forgotten how to put this outfit on, 
so I created an informative manual! 
… I won't lose it this time!
text.いついかなるレースでも…\r\nサクラ、咲かせてみせましょう！:
No matter the race… 
Let's make the Sakura blossoms bloom!
text.フッフッフ…なんと、\r\nバクシンしがいのあるマントでしょうッ！:
Fufufu… Why, what a very 
Bakushin mantle this is!
text.フフーン…誉れ高き学級委員長に\r\n挑みますか！:
Fufuu―n… Would you like to challenge 
the honorable class president!?
text.まだまだァーッ！バクシンの本領\r\nお見せしちゃいます！:
I've still got more in mee―! I'll 
show you Bakushin's true strength!
text.学級委員長の強さ、お見せしますっ！: I'll show you the strength of the class president!
text.お菓子作りもお任せください！\r\n全て模範的に行ってみせますとも！\r\n…ハ:
Leave the making of sweets to me! 
I shall be exemplary in all that I do! 
… Ha! It smells like something's burning!?
text.学級委員長の誇りを胸に、\r\n私はこの大会に挑みます！\r\n？ なぜポカンと:
With the pride of the class president 
residing in my heart, I shall challenge 
the competition! 
…? Why are you looking at me like that?
text.お疲れ様です！: Thank you for your hard work!
